Resdesc-1: Since 1995, savor the finest fish and Italian cuisine
Staffdesc: Our dedicated staff, with years of experience, ensures exceptional service and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. Passionate about culinary arts, they bring the best of fish and Italian cuisine to your table
Chefspecdesc: Our chef's specialty is the Linguine with Vongole, a classic Italian dish that is sure to delight your taste buds. This dish is a true testament to our chef's dedication to creating authentic and delicious cuisine. Don't miss the opportunity to try this signature dish at our restaurant.
CuisDesc: Aragosta Restaurant offers diverse dishes, focusing on fresh fish and authentic Italian cuisine, delighting Durres since 1995
